Kissa Crime Ka

Making full use of the fact that Radio is ‘Theater of Mind’ this will be a full fledged Movie . The Stories will have Thrill, Suspense, Drama and CRIME.

Popular Podcasts

GIG City Season 2

You’ve heard them sing aloud, now hear them speak their hearts out. Presenting exclusive interviews from Gig City Season 2, featuring singers KK, Kailash Kher, Shankar Mahadevan, Mika Singh and Benny Dayal.

Techno Talk With DIGIT.IN

Khana Aur Gaana

Missed your weekend dose of cookery and music? We’ve got you covered. Presenting all episodes of our exclusive podcast featuring the Sanjeev Kapoor-hosted radio show.

Survivors

Radio City Hindi brings to you, a brand new show - ‘Survivors’! A show featuring 8 different stories from across the country, of people who never gave up and survived all odds.
